snippet.title: Alone in the Dark - Official 'The Dark Man' Teaser Trailer
snippet.description:
Alone in the Dark is a reimagining of the 90's cult classic action psychological horror game developed by Pieces Interactive. Set in the gothic American South in the 1920s, players will experience the story through two protagonists as Edward Carnby or Emily Hartwood where exploring environments, fighting monsters, and solving puzzles are necessary to uncover the uneasy truth of Derceto Manor. Take a look at the latest teaser trailer depicting the Dark Man in Alone in the Dark, releasing on October 25 for PlayStation 5, Xbox Series S|X, and PC.

#IGN #Gaming #AloneInTheDark
